topic.title: Get to Know the PBX Desktop
topic.shortdesc: After you log in the PBX web interface, you will see the desktop. From here, you can manage your extension settings and check the voicemail messages, CDR, and recordings.

ul.li:
Main Menu: View all your applications.
To add application shortcut to the desktop, right click the application icon.

Open Application:
Click the icon of an application to show or hide its window on the desktop.
Right click the icon to minimize, maximize, restore, or close the application window.
Help: Click to visit our online help documents.
Options: Click to change the web language or log out.
